ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dragon manages to defeat Complete Carnage alongside the Turtles, who return home. On his way to Frank Darling's home, however, he is attacked by The Fiend, still in possession of Mrs. Harris. She breaks every bone in his body and leaves him inside a factory smokestack.
A continuation of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles / Savage Dragon Crossover #1.

ComicInfo.Title: Teamup With the Turtles
